name: Md. Mobin Chowdhury

company.name: Department of Physics, University of Dhaka

description: An undergraduate student in the Department of Physics at the University of Dhaka, Bangladesh, pursuing advanced studies in pure physics while maintaining expertise as a self-taught developer. Demonstrated proficiency in artificial intelligence and computer science innovations. Research interests are focused on fundamental areas of theoretical physics, including quantum gravity and quantum computing, complemented by extensive work in artificial intelligence applications. Committed to advancing the intersection of quantum physics and computational sciences.
